Text:
Ughhh...! H-How... How can this be happening...?
Noooooo!
Oh, is that all you've got? Pathetic.

Well, you entertained me for a bit... Now, it's time
to end this.
The blood... It's gathering...?

A gift for you. You will die by the blood of those
you killed.
S-Stop... I'm not done yet... A-Aaaaaaghhh!

...Not quite as elegant as Shadow would have done
it.
What truly terrifying power...

Are you okay? This building seems like it's about to
collapse.
Yes, let's get out of here.
Oh, about that...

I'm reaching my limit, so I'll leave the rest to
you.
R-Right...
Ngh... Ughh...?
Are you awake?
Oww... Is this...the Academy...?

Are you okay? It seems you hit your head,
so go easy.

...What's going on? What happened to the ball...
and Maximilian...?!
You must have been dreaming.

Dreaming...? Oh, right. That explains how
unrealistic it all was... It makes sense now―
...Wait, it totally doesn't! I'm not that gullible!

*sigh* ...I guess that would've been asking for too
much.
What're you sighing about?

You must've imagined it. Now that you're feeling better,
I'll be going...

You're not going anywhere! I won't ask who you are
or about the Cult, but...

Just answer this! Ultimately, what was the mask that
my brother...that Cid had?
It originally belonged to Rose Oriana.

During her stay in Midgar, she gifted it to Cid
Kagenou, inviting him to the masquerade ball
with the pair of masks.
...That's it?
What else did you think it was?

Umm... I thought maybe it was something Cid came up
with to hide his identity...
Are you still half asleep?
(Really...just a gift from Princess Rose to Cid...?)
*sigh* How misleading! Seriously!

(Still, at least it puts my mind at ease. I knew it.
There's no way Cid could be Shadow.)

...But that's odd. If the mask belonged to Princess
Rose, why did you have the other one?
...And she's gone...
...The Shadow Garden. Who are they, really?

Looks like I was totally used during this whole
incident. Well, at least I learned about Diablos.

I can't even remember how I got here after passing
out... Aurora, do you know anything?

...Hey, you could at least give some kind of answer.
All you do is make my left hand ache...
Huh? The ache... Has it stopped?

Anyway, more importantly...Cid! I wasn't able to get
any information on him this time... Maybe I should
interrogate those two who are always hanging around
him. What you seek is often right under your nose!

Once I find Cid...maybe I should put a leash on him
so he won't wander off again. Seriously...

With that thought, Claire sets off again in search
of Cid...
